about_the_game:
Game Features

From medieval beginnings to industrial breakthroughs, experience large-scale battles and strategic gameplay against other players or together against the AI!

Features:

  • Classic RTS Action: Build your base, gather resources, and lead your armies to victory!

  • Evolving Ages: Advance from medieval roots to the industrial revolution, unlocking powerful units, innovative structures, and new strategies as your civilization evolves!

  • Multiplayer: Challenge players worldwide or team up with friends through seamless Steam online functionality!

  • Massive Armies: Command diverse forces and execute strategies on a grand scale, from early skirmishes to full-scale warfare!

  • Strategic Depth: Adapt to changing battlefields, manage resources efficiently, and outmaneuver your opponents!

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel Core i3-8100 / AMD Ryzen 3 1200 or equivalent
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 750 Ti / AMD Radeon R7 260X or equivalent
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectX-compatible sound card
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel Core i5-9600K / AMD Ryzen 5 3600 or equivalent
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 1660 / AMD Radeon RX 590 or better
  • DirectX: Version 12
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectX-compatible sound card

short_description: A Real-Time Strategy game where you command factions from the early Middle Ages to the Industrial Revolution. Build up your base, manage your resources and engage in battles with your rivals in competitive multiplayer or together against AI opponents.
